discourse_list.title: Should Diamond Loupe Functions Return Tightly Packed Data?

content.content: twitter.com    Nick Mudge (mudgen)  If you are a software developer I need your help. Should diamonds use an efficient packed data encoding or should they use standard, easy to work with ABI coding?  See this blog post to evaluate and help make the choice: https://t.co/GbqmrGwPSm #ethereum #solidity  3:24 PM - 31 Aug 2020
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is asking for feedback from software developers on whether diamonds should use an efficient packed data encoding or standard, easy to work with ABI coding. The post provides a link to a blog post for evaluation and help in making the choice. The post also includes hashtags for Ethereum and Solidity.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal
